comments.en:
Experimental driver kit for some Casio label printers by Daniel Amkreutz. See hist web page for the full list of supported devices.

Evidently these printers are not USB printer-class devices, so this driver includes a libusb-based userspace USB driver program. Ultimately it accepts a 512x64 bitmap in xbm format.

Alternatively there is a cups backend and companion ppd with converter script.

There are not currently foomatic/lpr/pdq/ppr/etc integrations for this driver.
